title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 83-1.3 - Applicability of other laws, codes, rules and regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 83-1.3 - Applicability of other laws, codes, rules and regulations

State Regulations

Shared health facility providers, purveyors, operators, administrators, managers and employees shall comply with all Federal, State and local laws, codes, rules, and regulations pertaining to participation in the Medical Assistance Program, including, but not limited to pertinent sections and provisions of title XIX of the Social Security Act, the New York State Social Services Law, the New York State Public Health Law and codes, rules and regulations enacted pursuant thereto; the New York State Medical Handbook, medical plans of local social services districts, and with local laws, ordinances, codes, rules and regulations having general application. 83-1.3

Adopted, New

York State Register December 17, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 50, eff. 12/17/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
